description: Try our easy to follow Chocolate And Peanut Pancakes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chocolate And Peanut Pancakes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat frying pan on allow-medium heat
To the pancake shake bottle, add 1 tablespoon of granulated peanuts and 1 tablespoon milk choc chips. Shake well before adding 375 ml water.
Continue to prepare pancakes as per pack instructions.
Place milk choc chips into a microwave safe bowl and melt. Stack prepared pancakes, and drizzle caramel sauce and melted chocolate over the top. Sprinkle with granulated peanuts.
